Options between legal (licensed) and grey market. For this analysis data limited to legal (Licensed) venues
Highest-level category for product. Options include: All accessories, Ingestibles, Inhaleables, Other Cannabis, Topicals
Next layer of categorization. Multiple product category options

Further detail on product-type
Further detail on product-type
Product brand (multiple brands represented)
Plain text description of the product. Often a concatenated string of previous column values
Cumulative total sales in dollars
Cumulative total sold units

Details (if available) on whether or not the product is flavored and what the associated flavor is
If product comes in multiple items per-pack, this provides details on the number of items

If product includes CBD, details on Dosage in mg
Categorical to indicate whether the product includes CBD
Categorical to indicate the presence of a pax filter or not
If product contains a particular strain of Cannabis it is detailed here
Categorical indicator of if the product is flavored
Categorical to indicate if it is mood specific or not

Binning of retail price by $5 increments
